content.json:
## BIOS update report (for Lenovo devices) --- This workbook allows you to know: - BIOS update status - BIOS versions details on devices - Devices with old BIOS versions - Old BIOS versions per model & top 10 devices - Devices with BIOS older than 2 years "BIOS update status" values may change if new update are available
"Devices with BIOS not uptodate by severity" values may change if new update are available

parameters.name: LastBIOSReleaseDelay
parameters.label: Where last BIOS release is
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"1", "label":"> 1 day" },
    { "value":"7", "label":"> 7 days"},
    { "value":"10", "label":"> 10 days" },
    { "value":"20", "label":"> 20 days", "selected":true  },
    { "value":"30", "label":"> 30 days" },
    { "value":"40", "label":"> 40 days" },
    { "value":"50", "label":"> 50 days" },
    { "value":"60", "label":"> 60 days" },
    { "value":"70", "label":"> 70 days" },
    { "value":"80", "label":"> 80 days" },
    { "value":"90", "label":"> 90 days" },
    { "value":"100", "label":"> 100 days"},
    { "value":"120", "label":"> 100 days"},
    { "value":"120", "label":"> 150 days"}
]

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ComputerModel})
| where NewBIOSDaysOld > {LastBIOSReleaseDelay}
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| summarize LenovoBIOS_CL = count() by IsUptoDate , ModelFamilyname
content.title: BIOS update status

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend UpdateState = case(
IsUptoDate == "Yes", "Uptodate", 
IsUptoDate == "No" and NewerBIOSCount <= 1, "Uptodate", 
IsUptoDate == "No" and NewerBIOSCount > 1, "Not uptodate", 
"Unnown")
| summarize LenovoBIOS_CL = count() by UpdateState
content.title: Update status including BIOS with at most 1 version outdated

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSSeverity)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| extend LastBIOSDateFormated = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| summarize arg_max(LastBIOSDateFormated,*) by ModelMTM
| summarize ['Last 7 days']=countif(LastBIOSDate > ago (7d)),['Last 30 days']=countif(LastBIOSDate > ago (30d)),['Last 180 days']=countif(LastBIOSDate > ago (180d))
content.title: Count of new BIOS updates in the past few days

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= startofmonth(datetime_add("month",-12,now())) and TimeGenerated < startofmonth(now())
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, LastBIOSVersion, IsUptoDate) by Device, Month = startofmonth(TimeGenerated)
| project Device, Month, LastBIOSVersion, IsUptoDate
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where IsUptoDate == "Yes"
| summarize Count = count() by Month
| order by Month asc
| render timechart
content.title: Evolution of up-to-date devices over the past year chart

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= startofmonth(datetime_add("month",-12,now()))
  and TimeGenerated < startofmonth(now())
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, LastBIOSVersion, IsUptoDate) by Device, Month = startofmonth(TimeGenerated)
| project Device, Month, LastBIOSVersion, IsUptoDate
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where IsUptoDate == "Yes"
| extend Month =  format_datetime(Month,"MM-yyyy")
| summarize Count = count() by Month
| order by Month asc
content.title: Evolution of up-to-date devices over the past year

content.query:
let Today = now();
let InventoryStats = LenovoBIOS_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount);
union
(
    InventoryStats
    | where NewerBIOSCount <= 2
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "< 2 versions", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where NewerBIOSCount > 2 and NewerBIOSCount < 5
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "Between 2 and 5 versions", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where NewerBIOSCount > 5 and NewerBIOSCount < 10
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "Between 5 and 10 versions", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where NewerBIOSCount >= 10
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "> 10 versions", Count
)
| render piechart
content.title: BIOS not uptodate by count of newer versions (since current installed)

content.query:
let Today = now();
let InventoryStats = DriversInventory_CL
| where manufacturer_s contains "Lenovo"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend TimeDiff = datetime_diff('day', Today, BIOSDateFormated_value_t);
union
(
    InventoryStats
    | where TimeDiff <= 60
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "< 2 months", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where TimeDiff <= 180
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "< 6 months", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where TimeDiff <= 365
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "< 1 year", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where TimeDiff > 365 and TimeDiff < 730
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "Between 1 and 2 years", Count
),
(
    InventoryStats
    | where TimeDiff >= 730
    | summarize Count = count()
    | project Category = "> 2 years", Count
)
| render piechart
content.title: Devices with BIOS not uptodate since (in days)

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ComputerModel})
| where NewBIOSDaysOld > {LastBIOSReleaseDelay}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where IsUptoDate contains "No"
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| summarize LenovoBIOS_CL = count() by ModelFamilyname
content.title: Devices with BIOS not uptodate (per model and count of versions)

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSSeverity)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where LastBIOSDate > ago (30d)
| extend LastBIOSDateFormated = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Can not get info"
| summarize by ModelFamilyname,LastBIOSVersion,LastBIOSDateFormated,LastBIOSSeverity,LastBIOSSeverityLabel,ModelMTM
| summarize arg_max(LastBIOSDateFormated,*) by ModelMTM
| project Model=ModelFamilyname,MTM=ModelMTM,['BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,['Realease date']=LastBIOSDateFormated,['BIOS severity']=LastBIOSSeverityLabel
content.title: Last BIOS updates published on Lenovo website (in the past 30 days)

content.query:
DriversInventory_Translate_CL
| where isnotempty(WUName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s,WUName_s
| where DeviceManufacturer_s contains "lenovo"
| where DriverManufacturer_s contains "lenovo"
| where DriverName_s contains "System Firmware"
//| where DriverDate_t > ago (30d)
| extend DriverDate_Format = format_datetime(DriverDate_t, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| summarize arg_max(DriverDate_t,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s,['Package name']=WUName_s,['Package date']=DriverDate_Format
content.title: BIOS updates available as windows update in the past 30 days
BIOS versions history (per model)

parameters.name: DelayHistory
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"30", "label":"Last 30 days", "selected":true},
    { "value":"60", "label":"Last 60 days"},
    { "value":"90", "label":"Last 3 months"},
    { "value":"180", "label":"Last 6 months"},
    { "value":"365", "label":"Last year"},
    { "value":"730", "label":"Last 2 years"}
]
parameters.label: Delay history

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Can not get info"
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSSeverity)
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ModelHistory})
| order by LastBIOSDate
| extend LastBIOSDateFormated = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| where TimeGenerated > ago({DelayHistory}d)
| summarize by ModelFamilyname,LastBIOSVersion,LastBIOSDateFormated,LastBIOSSeverity,LastBIOSSeverityLabel,ModelMTM
| project Model=ModelFamilyname,MTM=ModelMTM,['BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,['Realease date']=LastBIOSDateFormated,['BIOS severity']=LastBIOSSeverityLabel

OptionalUpdates_CL
| where DriverClass_s contains "Firmware"
| where Title_s contains "Lenovo Ltd. - Firmware"
| where isnotempty(Title_s)
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| extend DriverDate_Format = format_datetime(DriverChangeTime_t, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| where DriverChangeTime_t > ago (30d)
| summarize arg_max(DriverChangeTime_t,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s
| order by DriverChangeTime_t
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s,['Package name']=Title_s,['Package date']=DriverDate_Format
content.title: BIOS updates available as optional windows update in the past 30 days

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Can not get info"
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSSeverity)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| extend LastBIOSDateFormated = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| summarize by ModelFamilyname,LastBIOSVersion,LastBIOSDateFormated,LastBIOSSeverity,LastBIOSSeverityLabel,ModelMTM
| summarize arg_max(LastBIOSDateFormated,*) by ModelMTM
| project Model=ModelFamilyname,MTM=ModelMTM,['BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,['Realease date']=LastBIOSDateFormated,['BIOS severity']=LastBIOSSeverityLabel
content.title: Last BIOS version by model

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| extend LastBIOSDateFormated = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| summarize ['Devices count'] = count() by Model=ModelFamilyname,['BIOS version']=CurrentBIOSVersion
| order by ['Devices count']
content.title: Devices count by BIOS version and model

content.query:
IntuneDevices
| where DeviceName contains "{ComputerName:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| extend DeviceLastContact = make_datetime(LastContact)
| extend DateFormat = format_datetime(DeviceLastContact,"MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm")
| project DateFormat

IntuneDevices
| where DeviceName contains "{ComputerName:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| project UserName

LenovoBIOS_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device, CurrentBIOSVersion
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Device contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| order by Device
| extend CurrentBIOSDateFormat = format_datetime(CurrentBIOSDate,"MM-dd-yyyy")
| extend LastBIOSDateFormat = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate,"MM-dd-yyyy")
| extend TimeGeneratedFormat = format_datetime(TimeGenerated,"MM-dd-yyyy")
| project Date=TimeGeneratedFormat,Device,['Current BIOS']=CurrentBIOSVersion,['Last BIOS']=LastBIOSVersion,['Current BIOS date']=CurrentBIOSDateFormat,['Last BIOS date']=LastBIOSDateFormat
content.title: History BIOS version for this device

content.query:
DriversInventory_Translate_CL
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or DeviceName_s contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where isnotempty(WUName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by WUName_s
//| extend CurrentBIOSDateFormat = format_datetime(CurrentBIOSDate,"MM-dd-yyyy")
//| extend LastBIOSDateFormat = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate,"MM-dd-yyyy")
//| extend TimeGeneratedFormat = format_datetime(TimeGenerated,"MM-dd-yyyy")
| where DeviceManufacturer_s contains "lenovo"
| where DriverManufacturer_s contains "lenovo"
| where WUName_s !contains "monitor" and DriverName_s !contains "thermal" and DriverName_s !contains "function keys" and DriverName_s !contains "battery" and DriverName_s !contains "standby" and DriverName_s !contains "5G" and DriverName_s !contains "PM device"
| where isnotempty(WUName_s)
| where DriverName_s contains "System Firmware"
| extend DriverDateFormat = format_datetime(DriverDate_t,"MM-dd-yyyy")
| project ['Windows Update package']=WUName_s,Driver=DriverName_s,['Driver date']=DriverDateFormat
//| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DriverName_s//, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
content.title: History Windows Update package for this device

content.query:
OptionalUpdates_CL
| where isnotempty(Title_s)
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or DeviceName_s contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where isnotempty(Title_s)
| where DriverClass_s contains "Firmware"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Title_s
| extend DriverChangeTimeFormated = format_datetime(DriverChangeTime_t, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| project ['Last script execution']=TimeGenerated,['Update package']=Title_s,Class=DriverClass_s,['Driver model']=DriverModel_s,['Driver change time']=DriverChangeTimeFormated,Description=Description_s
content.title: Optional updates available for this device

content.query:
let Today = now();
LenovoBIOS_CL 
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend DeviceName_s=Device
| join DriversInventory_CL on DeviceName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend CurrentBIOSDaysOld = datetime_diff('day',Today,BIOSDateFormated_value_t)
| order by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
| top 50 by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
| project DeviceName_s, ['Not updated since (in days']=CurrentBIOSDaysOld,User,Model=ModelFamilyname,['Current BIOS version']=CurrentBIOSVersion,['New BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,['BIOS severity']=LastBIOSSeverityLabel
content.title: Top 50 devices with old BIOS

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| top 50 by NewerBIOSCount
| project Device,User,NewerBIOSCount,ModelFamilyname,ModelMTM,SN
| order by NewerBIOSCount
content.title: Top 50 devices with old BIOS depending of newer versions count

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ComputerModel})
| where IsUptoDate == "Yes"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| where ModelMTM has_any ({ComputerMTM})
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Device contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| project Device, User, MTM=ModelMTM, Model=ModelFamilyname,['BIOS version']=CurrentBIOSVersion
content.title: Devices with BIOS uptodate

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where LastBIOSSeverityLabel has_any ({BIOSSeverity})
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ComputerModel})
| where ModelMTM has_any ({ComputerMTM})
| extend LastBIOSDateFormated = format_datetime(LastBIOSDate, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Device contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| project Severity=LastBIOSSeverityLabel,Device,User, ['MTM']=ModelMTM, Model=ModelFamilyname,['Current BIOS']=CurrentBIOSVersion,['New BIOS']=LastBIOSVersion,['Last BIOS date']=LastBIOSDateFormated
content.title: Devices with BIOS not uptodate

content.query:
OptionalUpdates_CL
| where DriverClass_s contains "Firmware"
| where Title_s contains "Lenovo Ltd. - Firmware"
| where isnotempty(Title_s)
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| extend DriverDate_Format = format_datetime(DriverChangeTime_t, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| summarize arg_max(DriverChangeTime_t,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s
| order by DriverChangeTime_t
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s,['Package name']=Title_s,['Package date']=DriverDate_Format
content.title: Last BIOS update available in optional updates by version and model

content.query:
DriversInventory_Translate_CL
| where isnotempty(WUName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s,WUName_s
| where DeviceManufacturer_s contains "lenovo"
| where DriverManufacturer_s contains "lenovo"
| where DriverName_s contains "System Firmware"
| summarize ['Devices count'] = count() by Model=ModelFriendlyName_s,['WUName_s']=WUName_s
| order by ['Devices count']
content.title: Devices count by Windows Update package version and model

content.query:
let Today = now();
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend DeviceName_s=Device
| join DriversInventory_CL on DeviceName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend CurrentBIOSDaysOld = datetime_diff('day',Today,BIOSDateFormated_value_t)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| order by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
| where CurrentBIOSDaysOld > 730
| where LastBIOSSeverityLabel has_any ({BIOSSeverity})
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ComputerModel})
| where ModelMTM has_any ({ComputerMTM})
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Device contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| project ['BIOS severity']=LastBIOSSeverityLabel,Device,User,Model=ModelFamilyname,['Current BIOS version']=CurrentBIOSVersion,['New BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,CurrentBIOSDaysOld
content.title: Devices with BIOS > 2 years

parameters.name: DelayOrVersion
parameters.label: Choose a way to filter

content.title: Devices to update depending of the age of the current BIOS

content.query:
let Today = now();
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend DeviceName_s=Device
| join DriversInventory_CL on DeviceName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend CurrentBIOSDaysOld = datetime_diff('day',Today,BIOSDateFormated_value_t)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| order by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
| where CurrentBIOSDaysOld > {DevicesToUpdateDelay}
| where isnotempty(CurrentBIOSDaysOld)
| where isnotempty(CurrentBIOSVersion)
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSVersion)
| summarize Total = count()
| extend Result = strcat(Total, " devices with BIOS older than {DevicesToUpdateDelay:label}")
| project Result

let Today = now();
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend DeviceName_s=Device
| join DriversInventory_CL on DeviceName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend CurrentBIOSDaysOld = datetime_diff('day',Today,BIOSDateFormated_value_t)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| order by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
| where CurrentBIOSDaysOld > {DevicesToUpdateDelay}
| where isnotempty(CurrentBIOSDaysOld)
| where isnotempty(CurrentBIOSVersion)
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSVersion)
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({DevicesToUpdateModel})
| summarize Models_Count = count() by ModelFamilyname
| order by Models_Count
//| count

let Today = now();
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend DeviceName_s=Device
| join DriversInventory_CL on DeviceName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend CurrentBIOSDaysOld = datetime_diff('day',Today,BIOSDateFormated_value_t)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| order by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
//| where CurrentBIOSDaysOld > 300
| where CurrentBIOSDaysOld > {DevicesToUpdateDelay}
| where isnotempty(CurrentBIOSDaysOld)
| where isnotempty(CurrentBIOSVersion)
| where isnotempty(LastBIOSVersion)
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({DevicesToUpdateModel})
| project Device,User,Model=ModelFamilyname,['Current BIOS version']=CurrentBIOSVersion,['New BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,['Count i days']=CurrentBIOSDaysOld,['Serial number']=SN

content.title: Devices to update depending of the count of newer versions available since the current one

content.query:
LenovoBIOS_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available" 
| where NewerBIOSCount > {NewerVersionsCount}
| summarize Total = count()
| extend Result = strcat(Total, " devices with more than {NewerVersionsCount} older versions since the current")
| project Result

LenovoBIOS_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available" 
| where NewerBIOSCount > {NewerVersionsCount}
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({DevicesToUpdateModel})
| summarize Models_Count = count() by ModelFamilyname
| order by Models_Count

LenovoBIOS_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where isnotempty(NewerBIOSCount)
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available" 
| where NewerBIOSCount > {NewerVersionsCount}
| project Device,CurrentBIOSVersion,LastBIOSVersion,NewerBIOSCount,ModelFamilyname,ModelMTM,SN,User

let Today = now();
LenovoBIOS_CL
| where IsUptoDate == "No"
| where LastBIOSVersion <> "Multiple versions available"
| extend DeviceName_s=Device
| join DriversInventory_CL on DeviceName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(BIOSVersion_s)
| extend CurrentBIOSDaysOld = datetime_diff('day',Today,BIOSDateFormated_value_t)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Device
| order by CurrentBIOSDaysOld desc
| where LastBIOSSeverityLabel has_any ({BIOSSeverity})
| where ModelFamilyname has_any ({ComputerModel})
| where ModelMTM has_any ({ComputerMTM})
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Device contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| project Device,User,Model=ModelFamilyname,['Current BIOS version']=CurrentBIOSVersion,['New BIOS version']=LastBIOSVersion,['Not uptodate since']=CurrentBIOSDaysOld
content.title: All devices with old BIOS
